segments.text: Hello ! I'm sorry to bother you . This is a complimentary fruit tray . Your food will be ready soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! It's a fruit sculpture ! Your chef is a real artist !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , uh , I made it myself ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You did ? Wow ! Where did you learn ... ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , but I've gotta run . Enjoy your food , and ring the service button if you need anything else !
segments.speaker: S1
